FutureTip Designed by Mukund Daily Self Help Expert Corner Relax, focus and pick the card below Please come back tomorrow for a new reading Love Reading Career Reading Health Reading Family Reading
ACTION 1 ACTION 2 Find your path with your loved ones Know your career choices better Insights into family well being Align your mental and physical self Destiny - Forces around you Karma - What you can do
Big change or end of a chapter, new beginning. A radical shift in your environment can bring up many mixed feelings. It is time to put them aside and go with the flow. The environment is encouraging you to change your own conditions. Look around and get rid of unwanted relationships and emotions and start afresh. Big change or end of a chapter, new beginning. A radical shift in your environment can bring up many mixed feelings. It is time to put them aside and go with the flow. The environment is encouraging you to change your own conditions. Look around and get rid of unwanted relationships and emotions and start afresh. Big change or end of a chapter, new beginning. A radical shift in your environment can bring up many mixed feelings. It is time to put them aside and go with the flow. The environment is encouraging you to change your own conditions. Look around and get rid of unwanted clutter and start afresh. Big change or end of a chapter, new beginning. A radical shift in your environment can bring up many mixed feelings. It is time to put them aside and go with the flow. The environment is encouraging you to change your own conditions.
Leaving temptation/passion in a quest for something more. Needs emotional strength Gain emotional strength from focusing on what you\'re going to achieve rather than what you\'re leaving behind. Don\'t succumb to the bad times as the sun rises every morning, and it gives you a chance to take away the darkness Leaving temptation/passion in a quest for something more. Needs emotional strength Don\'t lose hope. Hope is important for you to achieve what you\'re looking for. Have some loved one to support you emotionally through these times Leaving temptation/passion in a quest for something more. Needs emotional strength Don\'t lose hope. Hope is important for you to achieve what you\'re looking for. Keep good health and focus on not letting yourself down too much. Start/keep up health regimes. They\'ll benefit in due time Leaving temptation/passion in a quest for something more. Needs emotional strength Don\'t lose hope. Hope is important for you to achieve what you\'re looking for. Have some loved one to support you emotionally through these times
Hard work, Descipline, Consistency, Greed, Feeling of effort going in vain and less money for a lot of work. Find time outside work to get away and relax. Life dominated by greed to succeed has its side effects. Spend more time in finding out what you love and trying to find out if you can make money out of it. This can bring a good balance to your perception of work and money. Hard work, Descipline, Consistency, Greed, Feeling of effort going in vain. Love is like a monument. You need to work hard to bring it to shape. Be consistent in your efforts Hard work, Descipline, Consistency, Greed, Feeling of effort going in vain. Life is like a monument. You need to work hard to bring it to shape. Be consistent in your efforts Hard work, Descipline, Consistency, Greed, Feeling of effort going in vain. Family is like a monument. You need to work hard to bring it to shape. Be consistent in your efforts
Surrounded by problems, need the intelligence, guile and strength to move forward. We do feel trapped and isolated sometimes. The only way out is through determination and not through abandonement of the problems. Pray for strength to solve the problems, not for the problems to go away. Surrounded by problems, need the intelligence, guile and strength to move forward. We do feel trapped and isolated sometimes. The only way out is through determination and not through abandonement of the problems. Pray for strength to solve the problems, not for the problems to go away. Exciting time to be experimenting. Situations are leaving you "no time" for yourself. Events are happening fast around you. Build intelligence and strength to deal with unexpected events in this fast paced time. Be excited and go where the flow takes you, but exercise caution Exciting time for love. Emotions will move quicker than ever, so keep control. Build intelligence and strength to deal with unexpected events in this fast paced time. Be excited and go where the flow takes you, but exercise caution with rushing feelings Feel motivated to stay healthy. A good time to start a regime as the body will respond quickly. Build intelligence and strength to deal with unexpected health issues in this fast paced time. Be excited and go where the flow takes you, but maintian caution Fast paced life can result in family and close relations being ignored. Situations are favorable for quick catchups. Catch up with friends and family and make quick resolves. Be cautious for misunderstandings, don\'t rush with people\'s feelings or yours.
Crying over losses and not realizing the passions still in possession. Lesson over taking emotions for granted. Be hopeful and grateful. Opportunities will come but you have to learn your lessons. Don\'t waste time worrying about the past and move forward, learning from the mistakes and being grateful for what you have. Crying over losses and not realizing the passions still in possession. Lesson over taking emotions for granted Be hopeful and grateful. Understand that loving and respecting oneself is the most important thing. Know that ups and downs are part of life. This too shall pass Crying over losses and not realizing the passions still in possession. Lesson over taking emotions for granted. Don\'t let the situations get the best of you. Disappointments are part of life and are essential for a drive to be better. Don\'t waste time on lost opportunities and move on so you can make the future better Crying over losses and not realizing the passions still in possession. Lesson over taking emotions for granted. Be hopeful and grateful. Understand that loving and respecting oneself is the most important thing. Know that ups and downs are part of life. This too shall pass.
A disappointment gives teaching. Health and money pose problems. Be cautious of overspending or risky investments. Find refuge in family and togetherness instead of seeking monetary satisfaction. A disappointment gives teaching. Health and money pose problems. Seek comfort from all the problems in togetherness. Focus on relationships/friendships as they can act as a refuge from the problems A disappointment gives teaching. Health and money issues arise or continue. Seek comfort in loved ones. Keep caring people close. A disappointment gives teaching. Health and money issues arise or continue. Family is the ultimate savior. Keep close with loved ones and seek their help to heal. Find comfort in togetherness.
A teaching on overconfidence Don\'t take your life\'s matters for granted. Go deeper. Don\'t be always sure as you may be missing what\'s important. A teaching on overconfidence Don\'t take your life\'s matters for granted. Go deeper. Don\'t be always sure as you may be missing what\'s important. A teaching on overconfidence Don\'t take your life\'s matters for granted. Go deeper. Don\'t be always sure as you may be missing what\'s important. Mock fight that\'ll teach a lesson, quest of achievement between people of equal footing Competition is tough. Don\'t underestimate anybody. It is time to rise and focus only on yourself in order to do good. Mock fight that\'ll teach a lesson, quest of achievement between people of equal footing Money matters, underappreciation of your partner/loved one can turn happy relationships sour. Work towards meeting in the middle and dousing the inequality and misunderstandings. Mock fight that\'ll teach a lesson, quest of achievement between people of equal footing Money matters, bad health and working against your own desires can turn happy times sour. Stay vigilant of health concerns and avoid unwanted confrontations. Mock fight that\'ll teach a lesson, quest of achievement between people of equal footing Money matters, underappreciation of your family can turn happy relationships sour. Work towards meeting in the middle and dousing the inequality and difference of opinion.
Career stagnation and saturation, lack of motivation, dissatisfaction with people and job Realize the gifts you have which you often ignore, try to learn new things or change to a stream you love to bring back the excitement. Dissatisfaction/saturation with love, lack of passion and happiness, a state of not being given what you asked for Realize your blessings, make your partner/yourself happy by changing your attitude, Compromise a little and be grateful. Dissatisfaction with health, lack of motivation, unwillingness to make a change Realize your blessings, be grateful to be alive, things won\'t change unless you change them so get up Dissatisfaction with family, lack of passion and happiness, a state of not being given what you asked for Realize your blessings, make your family/yourself happy by changing your attitude, Compromise a little and be grateful.
Order, structure, control, power, Holding on too tight to money, frugality turning into stinginess Have a good control over your finances. Learn to be generous with money. Order, structure, control, power Relationship can become a struggle for control and importance. Don\'t let it happen. Practise generosity. Give space to loved ones and let them exercise their control too. Order, structure, control, power, Holding on too tight to money, frugality turning into stinginess. Practise generosity and relinquishing control. This will ease up a lot of mental and physical pressure in life. Order, structure, control, power Family situation can become a struggle for control and importance. Don\'t let it happen. Practise generosity. Give space to loved ones and let them exercise their control too.
Reflection upon what truly matters, stepping away from the actions and relaxing, refocusing Be cautious of procrastination and wilful delay in actions. Take your time to step away to a calmer place but with a conviction to come back stronger and more prepared Reflection upon what truly matters, stepping away from the actions and relaxing, refocusing Ideal time to step away from the work and responsibilities for brief period and focusing on loved ones. Be aware and keep this period short and contolled and don\'t move out of the action completely Reflection upon what truly matters, stepping away from the actions and relaxing, refocusing Ideal time to step away from the work and responsibilities for brief period to focus on health. Try meditation and relaxation methods which prepare you to come back stronger and more focused Reflection upon what truly matters, stepping away from the actions and relaxing, refocusing Ideal time to step away from the work and responsibilities for brief period and to focus on family and friends. They matter a lot and some of the people are not properly recognized for their efforts they make for you. Give them some quality time, get some inspiration from them and use it to build your strength and focus back.
Minor celebration, success but with further work to be done. Remember the task is not yet finished. Don\'t leave it behind, swept away by any distraction. It is your time to focus and also enjoy in moderation at the same time. Minor celebration, success but with further work to be done. Feel happy about the small progress. It is important to look around and realize that there are things left to be done, so keep the intent alive. Minor celebration, success but with further work to be done. Feel happy about the small progress in health through hard work. It is important to look around and realize that there are things left to be done, so keep the motivation alive. Minor celebration, success but with further work to be done. Feel happy about the small progress in family matters. It is important to look around and realize that there are things left to be done, so keep the intent alive.

Slow, cautious, protective, less inclined to take action hastily, pragmatic youth, thought out plan, materialistic, serious Take your time and be patient and wise with your career choices but also know that life is what happens when we\'re busy making plans. Avoid overthinking. Slow, cautious, protective, less inclined to take action hastily, pragmatic youth, thought out plan, materialistic, serious Avoid over-analyzing and overthinking. Not everybody who makes all the plans and thinks of every possible angle, is successful in love. Practice letting go a little. Slow, cautious, protective, less inclined to take action hastily, pragmatic youth, thought out plan, materialistic, serious Avoid over-analyzing and overthinking as it can lead to loss of focus and time. Not everybody who makes all the plans and thinks of every possible angle, is happy. Practice letting go and not taking every action too seriously. Slow, cautious, protective, less inclined to take action hastily, pragmatic youth, thought out plan, materialistic, serious Avoid over-analyzing and overthinking. Not everybody who makes all the plans and thinks of every possible angle can guarantee a perfect family life. Practice letting go of things you don\'t have control over.
Conflicts, arrogance, haste, power, teen spirit too smart for it\'s own good, free speech Calm down and realize that not everything needs to be solved today. Don\'t make uninformed or ignorant decisions as they may land you in trouble. Conflicts, arrogance, haste, power, teen spirit too smart for it\'s own good, free speech Childish arguments can erupt if you are not cautious. Don\'t harbor grudges. Straightforwardness is not always a solution. Rapid changes, center of attention, headstrong man. Be undeterred by the environment, stand your ground and have faith in your ideas Rapid changes, center of attention, headstrong man Be undeterred by the environment, stand your ground and have faith in your ideas of love. Rapid changes, center of attention, headstrong man Be undeterred by the environment, stand your ground and have faith in your efforts. Don\'t let anything adversely affect your well being. Rapid changes, center of attention, headstrong man Be undeterred by the environment, stand your ground and have faith in your ideas and your loved ones.
Time for new ideas to take shape. Inspiration can come from anywhere. Try to find new ways of doing things and take lessons from the past. If there is time for new ideas to take shape, it is now. Exchange of new ideas and inspiration between lovers Look for the company of people who are inspiring and have lots of ideas and dreams. This exchange can be a good basis of a new relationship or a revival of an old one. Time for new awareness towards health, renewed interest and necessity to be better both mentally and physically Seek out ideas that encourage. Don\'t waste much time weighing the options. It\'s time to rise up and start something new. New companionship, renewed interest in family affairs, start of important events Think of new ways to make relationships work. New approaches can bring a totally new flavor to home and family life. Things are starting afresh, new perspectives can challenge you, so be open minded.
Victory, completion, satisfaction, creative energy, recognition The universe is creating a moment of celebration. A time to look back and feel good about where you are at the moment and to enjoy it. Be cautious of overindulgence in this merry land universe has created. Also be aware not to be too proud of your accomplishments. Earthly pleasures, satisfaction in relationship, blissful company, wishes coming true It is a time to love and be loved back. A time to look back and feel good about where you are at the moment and to enjoy it. Be cautious of overindulgence in this merry land universe has created. Happiness, completion, satisfaction, richness, enthusiasm The universe is creating a moment of celebration. A time to look back and feel good about where you are at the moment and to enjoy it. Be cautious of overindulgence in this merry land universe has created. Also be aware not to be too proud of your accomplishments. Happiness, completion, satisfaction, richness, enthusiasm The universe is creating a moment of celebration. A time to look back and feel good about where you are at the moment and to enjoy it with the family. Time to share and live in the moment and realizing the gift of company.
Luck, money, small indulgence as a token or a gift for hard work and achievement of goals Be glad to have the luck and the pleasures that you have. Appreciate every bit of hard work you put in and the people who support you. Give back small tokens of appreciation to yourself and others in this small journey of life. Fears, despair, anxiety, worry about career and mistakes made This is a reminder to wake up. The negativity and depression in overanalysis of your past can lead to harmful consequences that stretch out to workplace and other avenues of life. Out of the darkest nights, comes the brightest of mornings. Have hope. Fears, despair, anxiety, guilt, being left alone This is a reminder to wake up. The negativity and depression in overanalysis of your past can lead to harmful consequences that stretch out to your loved one\'s life. Out of the darkest nights, comes the brightest of mornings. Have hope for solution, don\'t dwell on the problems too long. Fears, despair, anxiety, depression, self loathing This is a reminder to wake up. The negativity and depression in overanalysis of your past can lead to unhealthy mental and physical consequences. Have hope for solution, don\'t dwell on the problems too long. The negativity and depression in overanalysis of your past can lead to harmful consequences that stretch out to your loved one\'s life. Out of the darkest nights, comes the brightest of mornings. New love becons The universe is signalling towards a new love, a renewed interest in everyday things. It needs you to manifest positive energy towards everyone who you work with. Appreciate someone sincerely and be grateful for what you\'re doing. New love becons. Emotions guiding the way more than reason The universe is waiting for you to open your eyes and see that you need to see the life from a different, fresh perspective. Take a look around and be grateful for what you have. Renew your interest in love and spread affection to those who are underappreciated. New love becons. Emotions guiding the way more than reason The universe requires you to look at the benefits of your effort. Nothing is achieved without hard work and constant nourishment of love towards that work. Time to manifest that nourishment. New love becons. Emotions guiding the way more than reason The universe wants you to sincerely appreciate and find something to be thankful for in the oddest of places. A great time to call up those who you don\'t usually and re-establish the bonds. Find more positives than negatives.
New health, luck and prosperity, solid gains The universe allows improvements in all aspects of your existence. Take the opportunity and open your eyes to fruitful ventures and don\'t shy away from taking risk. New health, luck and prosperity, solid gains. The universe allows improvements in all aspects of your existence. Take the opportunity and open your eyes to this new luck and be grateful and invest it on well being. New health, luck and prosperity, solid gains The universe allows improvements in all aspects of your existence including health. Take the opportunity and open your eyes to this new luck and be grateful and invest it on well being. New health, luck and prosperity, solid gains. The universe allows improvements in all aspects of you and your loved one\'s existence. Take the opportunity and open your eyes to this new luck and be grateful and invest it on well being.459104
Inception of a challenge. Good or bad surprises on the way Be open minded and expectant of new things starting up around you. Welcome new challenges and overcome them with confidence. There is nothing to fear if we take everything as an experience. Inception of a challenge. Good or bad surprises on the way Welcome new challenges in relationship because if we see the bigger picture, overcoming challenges is the only thing that defines an individual and his/her relationship with the loved ones. Inception of a passion, new journey. Your destiny and desire want you to find something you\'re passionate about. The inclination is there, the atmosphere is there, the karma is upto you. So go ahead and find that passion and set plans into motion. Inception of a passion, new journey Your destiny is inclining towards sparking of new passion, renewed interest in love. No atmosphere or situation is complete without your effort. Come up with new energy, acknowledge what the universe wants set plans in motion. Inception of a passion, new journey The universe is signalling a new start. It needs your support. Bring a new desire to renew your health and life. Find something you\'re passionate about. Be more inclined and you\'ll see the flow of nature is guiding you to start anew. Inception of a passion, new journey The universe is signalling a new start. It needs your support. Bring a new desire to renew your relationships. Be more inclined and you\'ll see the flow of nature is guiding you to start anew.
Fresh emotions, creativity, childlike, innocent kindness and empathy. Seek the unknown with happiness and generosity. New ideas and ways to improve upon your current state are right around the corner, go find them. Make a start. Fresh emotions, creativity, childlike, innocent kindness and empathy. Renewed enthusiasm and love can help you discover new ways in love life. Don\'t forget to have fun no matter what Fresh emotions, creativity, childlike, innocent kindness and empathy Approach your health with fun ways to improve it and you\'ll make much progress. Don\'t get stuck in a rut and the environment will be brimming with hope and sense of discovery. Fresh emotions, creativity, childlike, innocent kindness and empathy Renewed enthusiasm and empathy towards family and friends is required. Don\'t forget to have fun no matter what.
Opportunity in land/money, Serious instincts relating to money and future It is a good time to plan for future. Be receptive of the current opportunities, trends in investment and be inclined towards finding new ways to earn more through hard work. Stay curious of new oppportunities and wary of mood swings of disinterest and overthinking Overthinking, mood-swings, immaturity Being perceptive in relationship can help understand the needs of the loved ones better but it doesnt stop you from getting the wrong ideas. Be careful that your immature decisions don\'t affect others. Activity, careful observation and alertness Be alert and vigilant of your health. Now is the right time to observe. Overthinking, mood-swings, immaturity Being perceptive in relationship can help understand the needs of the loved ones better but it doesnt stop you from getting the wrong ideas. Be careful that your immature decisions don\'t affect others.
Travel, passion, career move, entering, willingness, energy, curiosity to explore new things Time to take risky steps and bold moves to help your career. Right energy and good mix of attitude can help pivot you to the right direction. Time to start following the heart. Travel, passion, career move, entering, willingness, energy, curiosity to explore new things. Matters of heart announce boldly and it is the right time to listen to them. Untamed feelings can leave you vulnerable for later damage, so be cautious while letting the heart make all the decisions. Travel, passion, career move, entering, willingness, energy, curiosity to explore new things. Be ready and unafraid to make important decisions and bold moves when it comes to your or family health. Travel, passion, career move, entering, willingness, energy, curiosity to explore new things. Be ready and unafraid to make important decisions and bold moves when it comes to your or family. Feel energetic and resourceful as you can contribute a lot to the affairs of the family.
Quiet, spiritual, emotional support, moodiness, depression, self reflection, caring You\'re caring but expect a lot in return and when you don\'t get it, all the moodiness and depression shows up. This repeats in a cycle. Realize that universe is not always bidirectional and not all the things you do have to have emotions attached to them. Be more practical and grow thick skin as it is important to skip over disappointments and be afloat no matter what.
